titles.title: Rural Small Business Resilience Act
Rural Small Business Resilience Act
Rural Small Business Resilience Act
A bill to require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to improve access to disaster assistance for individuals located in rural areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Reported by Senator Ernst without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 131.

committee.name: Senate Small Business and Entrepreneurship
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
